name: Sundaygar Dearboy
description: '''Michael Davies''', who is better known as '''Sundaygar Dearboy''', is a [[Liberia]]n  singer, songwriter and record producer from [[Grand Bassa County]]. He primarily sings in [[Bassa language|Bassa]] and [[Liberian English]] and has released several studio albums, including ''See Boyee'', ''Don't Live with Woman'' (2007) and ''Rebirth'' (2012). He was named the Liberian Musician of the Year between 2005 and 2006, and has produced thirteen albums to date.
